data.description: Parallel execution of closures via fork.
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Closures allow user flexability in setting up the queue w/o having
    to

    use OO in all cases. This is different than Proc::Queue in that the

    user passes in a full queue and lets Schedule::Parallel run them

    all N-way parallel. In this sense the module is more of a parallel

    scheduler than a process control mechanism.
